subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: With a ferocious defense that held L.S.U. running back Leonard Fournette, the presumptive Heisman Trophy front-runner, to 31 yards on 19 carries, Alabama ran away with the game in the second half.
snippet: With a ferocious defense that held L.S.U. running back Leonard Fournette, the presumptive Heisman Trophy front-runner, to 31 yards on 19 carries, Alabama ran away with the game in the second half.
